name: The Belvedere Chest
description: The very essence of smart simplicity, the Belvedere is a versatile chest that could be placed in a range of interiors to provide a sophisticated finishing touch. Graceful and charming, it works its magic effortlessly. Macassar ebony is an exotic black hardwood with reddish-brown highlights, that inject dark, rich tones into a room while its natural stripy grain adds a touch of the organic. Polished nickel detailing in the form of the handle and a slick recessed plinth contrast beautifully with the dark wood, adding just a hint of modern metallic pizzazz. Also available in nickel, brass or antiqued brass in a polished or brushed finish.
